description:
Versatility. freedom of movement, reliability. These are the core principles behind Arcteryx's Beta series of waterproof-breathable garments. The full side zips make on-and-off easy, and GORE-TEX fabric with a C-KNIT ™ backer ensures superior breathable performance. Exact tailoring is streamlined while still accommodating layers so you're ready for whatever weather Mother Nature throws your way. Be comfortable and confident when your adventure takes you beyond what you thought was possible.

  • Hard-wearing 70-denier 3-layer nylon face fabric
  • Completely waterproof, breathable, and durable GORE-TEX C-KNIT construction
  • Articulated patterning for dynamic moves in mountain environments
  • Gusseted crotch for comfort and extended range of motion
  • Full length two-way zippers make for easy on and off when wearing boots and crampons
  • Elasticized waist with adjustable drawcord for a secure fit
  • Laminated instep patches protect against damage from boots, crampons, and ski edges
  • Highly water-resistant external zippers used throughout
  • Athletic, streamlined fit accommodates thermal layers
name: Arc'teryx Beta Pants - Women's
